document_data.name: Dagnan
document_data.mainbody: '''Dagnan''' was an outlaw member of [[Broadshield's Beasts]] in [[Cormyr]].
document_data.History: In [[1480 DR]], Dagnan was with [[Broadshield]] when they tried to to capture [[Arclath Delcastle]] and [[Amarune Whitewave]] in order to deliver them to [[Alorglauvenemaus]].
